title: So what are your plan about Twisted Treeline 3v3?
body:
The minions are still the old ones that have armor and magic resist.

There are still items like Grez's Lantern which is similar to Madreds, but it does not even belong in the jungle item section.

Is there a reason to why you guys only changed the jungle monster to the new ones but didn't change the minions + items like Grez? And I feel like you guys abandoned the Treeline Mode. In my opinion, there should be more unique items/features about the map.

You guys gna change the whole map since the "Shadow Isle" trend has passed or something?

Like seriously, what is your plan about the map?

replies.body:
more like shadow isles minions, towers, inh and nexus

with new jungle camp more scary and of course vilemaw stays
It doesn't matter what they do. It will NEVER be as good as the original Twisted Tree Lines. This new map should have been a Halloween event. It's been in beta for like two years now. RIP TT.

I agree on how the original Twisted Treeline was better, but saying that there will never be a map better than the old treeline is just stupid. Riot may create a new Treeline map which is even better than the current one and the original one combined. Try to live a positive life man.

While possible, I find it unlikely. I remember reading somewhere that riot was moving away from supporting other maps/modes so that a majority of the players would flock to SR. For them to develop another mode like the original TT, I see as highly unlikely. Although it would be awesome if that happened.
Note: the jungle camps hit so hard that in high elo jungling is completely ditched, the superior strategy has been duo lanes for about 3 months now.
Lol, Has anybody EVER jungled in TT? As far as I've known, the jungle there is useless.

> [{quoted}](name=Pixel Molotov,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=NxtPsFoA,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-02-15T23:30:16.520+0000)
>
> Lol, Has anybody EVER jungled in TT? As far as I've known, the jungle there is useless.


What? For the last 30 TT games I only went Jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=YOU BEEN WARNED,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=NxtPsFoA,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-02-15T22:54:50.255+0000)
>
> Note: the jungle camps hit so hard that in high elo jungling is completely ditched, the superior strategy has been duo lanes for about 3 months now.

Above silver, Jungling has been ditched since early season 4 because the support gold stream>jungle gold stream, and you can get more farm on your carries more safely by sharing the jungle.
Can we see some competitive Twisted Tree Lines?{{champion:57}}

the old TT had some issues... I liked the old TT except for the fact that there was entirely to much brush and dragon control was nearly impossible (no wards plus the top area was HUGE) jungling TT was more viable back then because of the singular buff but the new one with altars provides a nice balance for TT junglers

the only thing realy wrong with new TT is it's size compared to turret spacing, the old TT was much bigger and had better turret spacing but the new TT has turret smashed right in the back lines with LONGGGGGGGGGG lanes making getting the first turret pretty hard (as teams will not have enough time to push that distance so they opt to get an altar instead

TLDR: old TT was nice in size but lacked balance in the map itself
new TT has good balance but has size issues

> [{quoted}](name=Slayermaster115,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=NxtPsFoA,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-02-15T23:37:22.936+0000)
>
> no wards

Not sure what old TT you are talking about, they removed the wards when they remade it, it used to have them. Removal of the wards was and still is my biggest objection to the new TT, I have adapted, and have no problem abusing the lack of vision, but it makes entire classes of characters unplayable (adcs besides Vayne lucian and Kalista). Coming from a TT main.

> [{quoted}](name=Findoglorian,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=NxtPsFoA,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-02-16T01:33:47.366+0000)
>
> Not sure what old TT you are talking about, they removed the wards when they remade it, it used to have them. Removal of the wards was and still is my biggest objection to the new TT, I have adapted, and have no problem abusing the lack of vision, but it makes entire classes of characters unplayable (adcs besides Vayne lucian and Kalista). Coming from a TT main.

I dont remember them having wards on old TT 
either way I do miss old TT the layout of the map was pretty cool
It wasn't so bad when grez/lightbringer still had moderately acceptable stats, now there is now way to check for incoming ganks at all.

> [{quoted}](name=Findoglorian,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=NxtPsFoA,comment-id=0007000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-16T23:26:45.820+0000)
>
> It wasn't so bad when grez/lightbringer still had moderately acceptable stats, now there is now way to check for incoming ganks at all.

map awarness and teemo shrooms, see the new map is so small that even if you could check for ganks itd be useless :C

I call Bull on that, grez used to be great to check the brush above wolves when grabbing wolves or moving around on the map to avoid bush camping when you couldn't see 2 members of the opposing team, now you have to either take a longer rout or face-check the bush which makes squishier and lower mobility champs an automatic no-go for top-lane. My average KDA on toplane champs in general shifted when I could no longer justify building Grez.
They will do the same thing with TT as they did (doing) with Dominion - nothing.  The money is made on SR they rest are just there.  Sad{{item:3070}}

The money is made on playerbase, they proved that they know this when they made QoL changes for the casuals who only play bots, they are making a huge mistake to ignore their TT and dominion playerbase.
i think the main game is more about he rift so they do care less..but i think they shuld form a new balance team exclusively for twisted tree line. also alot less players use that map

> [{quoted}](name=zoran999,realm=EUNE,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=NxtPsFoA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-15T20:08:26.499+0000)
>
>  i think they shuld form a new balance team exclusively for twisted tree line. 


so true. agree to that x 3000

Not to mention that when you click the Twisted Treeline from the menu, the background image is same as the one for summoner's rift. Every time I click Twisted Treeline, it just feels fucking wrong.

Sure, summoners rift is Riot's main map, but you should know that as time passes, more people will get tired of the summoners rift, like me. I started playing dominions and treelines because I got too tired of SR. Too freakin boring.
Can we at least get Hex back on TT, the only game mode worth playing since urf lol

that would be great too.
Come to think of it, Dominion has its own unique minion.
Why not the Treeline?
If I could, I would slap you in the face for your grammar. :D jk
I was just writing whatever came up on my mind. Fixed some grammar tho thanks
